easai.math

Class Complex

  • java.lang.Object
    • easai.math.Complex

  • public class Complex
extends java.lang.Object
    The Complex class represents a complex number class.
    Author:
    easai

    • Field Summary

      static Complex I
      The imaginary number i.

      The real part of the complex number.
